CustomField.description: If 'PE Facilitator Meeting Date' field value is not null and is in the past, a Couple is considered to have met with their PE Facilitator.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If 'PE Facilitator Meeting Date' field value is not empty and the date is in the past, a Couple is considered to have met with their PE Facilitator.
CustomField.label: Couple Met with PE Facilitator
